#include <SSLClientSocket.h>

Detailed Description

securely connected Socket. 

 SSLClientSocket sck;
 sck.addSocketListener(l); // l should be a pointer to an implementation
                           // ISocketListener
 sck.connect(IPEndPoint(IP4Address(10, 8, 49, 63), 50000));
